General.Name: Maxim Power Corp.
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Maxim Power Corp., a power producer company, engages in the development, ownership, and operation of power generation facilities in Canada. The company operates Milner power plant, a gas-fired turbine generator located in Grande Cache, Alberta. Maxim Power Corp. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 715-5th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 2X6
